roleset.name: slow a car via brakes
roleset.note: BRAKE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'brake' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from brake.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: not verbal
example.text: Mr. Redford, like it or not, is like a braking system on a runaway truck, kind of slowing it down into control.

example.name: verbal
example.text: John braked his car just after driving off the cliff.
example.arg: just after driving off the cliff
